name: Tiny Endless Dungeon
description:
——————[ Tiny Endless Dungeon ]——————

[scroll down for controls]

Dodge enemies, fireballs, lasers, and other things, while collecting coins! Buy new skins in the shop, which give you different backgrounds, different enemies, and different colored fireballs! Yeah… enjoy! 

> IMPORTANT: Blood Particles are on by default. If you would not like to see them (they’re not very realistic, just red pixels), then toggle them on/off in settings

Please report any bugs in the comments

This game was originally made in Scratch, play it here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/774104572/

—————————[ Controls ]—————————

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Press SPACE to dash into zombies (fireballs and lasers will insta kill you)

—————————[ Credits ]—————————

(all people link can be found on Scratch)

> Inspired by @theChAOTiC’s Dungeon Dash: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/178966496/

> Score/Number counters are by @ShiftClickLearn

> Music is also from @theChAOTiC’s game Dungeon Dash: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/178966496/

> Sound effects are from Scratch Sound Library (SSL)

> Art and code is by me 

> 1769 Scratch blocks!

———————————————————————
